name: Chickado
description:
Chickado is a unique game that focuses on the unforgettable and brave revenge struggle of an oppressed and scorned chick.

Game Features:

  • The main character is a small chick living on a farm, crushed under the pressure and oppression of other animals.
  • Players will take part in the heroic journey by controlling the chick.
  • The character selection feature will allow playing with different chicks with unique features.
  • Players will prove their strength and develop their character by battling other animals on the farm.
  • They can make the chick even stronger by acquiring new weapons and abilities.
  • The mechanics of directing automatically firing weapons will test tactical skills and quick reactions.
  • Various support tools and turrets will be available to help the character in the fight for survival.
  • Players will face enemy waves by choosing among different sections on the farm, developing their strategies.

Chickado offers a unique experience for those who love farm adventures with its extraordinary story, exciting gameplay, and deep mechanics. If you enjoyed games like "Brotato" and "Vampire Survivors" take the step into the adventure of the little chick and join the game now!
